bug.short_desc: Remove "Report Bug" button when mozplugger plugin is used

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: When sealert applies plugins on new report related to mozilla_plugin_t in catchall plugin is option "Report Bug", lot of users blindly reporting this AVC, but solution is just use booleans like: mozilla_plugin_can_network_connect unconfined_mozilla_plugin_transition
Result of this situation is big number of reports classified as NOTABUG.
How reproducible: always
Actual results: "Report Bug" button is available when mozplugger plugin is used.
Expected results: "Report Bug" button should not be available when mozplugger plugin is used.

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
